clustering_eval_toolbox module¶

@author: The KnowEnG dev team

class clustering_eval_toolbox.ColumnType[source]¶

Bases: enum.Enum

Two categories of phenotype traits.

CATEGORICAL = 'categorical'¶
CONTINUOUS = 'continuous'¶
clustering_eval_toolbox.chisquare(phenotype_df)[source]¶

Perform a chi-square test and report the results.

Parameters:
phenotype_df: dataframe with two columns with clusters and phenotype trait values. ret: result of the phenotype dataframe.
clustering_eval_toolbox.clustering_evaluation(run_parameters)[source]¶

Run clustering evaluation on the whole dataframe of phenotype data. Save the results to tsv file.

clustering_eval_toolbox.combine_phenotype_data_and_clustering(run_parameters)[source]¶

This is to insert the sample clusters column into the phenotype dataframe.

Returns:
phenotype_df: phenotype dataframe with the first column as sample clusters.
clustering_eval_toolbox.f_oneway(phenotype_df)[source]¶

Perform a f_oneway test and report the results.

Parameters:
phenotype_df: dataframe with two columns with clusters and phenotype trait values. ret: result of the phenotype dataframe.
clustering_eval_toolbox.run_post_processing_phenotype_clustering_data(cluster_phenotype_df, threshold)[source]¶

This is the clean up function of phenotype data with nans removed.

Parameters:
cluster_phenotype_df: phenotype dataframe with the first column as sample clusters. threshold: threshold to determine which phenotype to remove.
Returns:
output_dict: dictionary with keys to be categories of phenotype data and values to be a list of related dataframes.
